description: Graylog metrics using Telegraf as collector.

targets.query: SELECT mean("available") FROM "mem" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("used") FROM "mem" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("total") FROM "mem" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_idle") FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("usage_iowait") FROM "cpu" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("bytes_recv"), 10s) FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "interface" =~ /^$int$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(none)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("bytes_sent"), 10s) FROM "net" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "interface" =~ /^$int$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("read_bytes"), 10s) FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("write_bytes"), 10s) FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

list.label: host
list.name: host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "org.graylog2.throughput.input.1-sec-rate" WITH KEY = "host"

list.label: int
list.name: int
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "net" WITH KEY = "interface" WHERE "host" =~ /$host/

title: Graylog Metrics
